verse:
पुरमेकादशद्वारमजस्यावक्रचेतसः।
अनुष्ठाय न शोचति विमुक्तश्च विमुच्यते। एतद्वै तत्

upanishad-org.meaning: The Unborn who is not devious-minded hath a city with eleven gates; when He taketh up his abode in it, He grieveth not, but when He is set free from it, that is His deliverance. This is the thing thou seekest.
